name: 16x16 Dungeon: Ragnarok
description:
A low rez epic Adventure Controls:

WASD - Movement

Enter - Attack / Interact

Audio is importand for this game. Please make sure you use audio!

Description:

Thor, the god of thunder, is on search for answers. He travels to an dwarve forge in the seek of the world serpant. May the rumors true? Has the gigantic snake left the border to Udgard? Will Ragnarok begin?

Development Background:

The game was developed in two weeks for the low rez game jam. The vision was, to deliver a game, that makes heavy use of the players imagination, like a book. So the art is reduced to the important.

Any feedback is much appreciatet. Its a kind of a experimental game and I would be happy to improve on this idea in the future
